name: @automattic/jetpack-publicize
description: Publicize makes it easy to share your siteâ€™s posts on several social media networks automatically when you publish a new post.
author: Automattic

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-client
scripts.//: # We set NODE_PATH here so postcss-loader can find its plugins with pnpm 7. See https://github.com/pnpm/pnpm/discussions/3536#discussioncomment-2688984
scripts.build-production-concurrently: pnpm run clean && concurrently 'NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production pnpm run build-client' && pnpm run validate
scripts.watch: pnpm run build && NODE_PATH="$PWD/node_modules" webpack watch
